mentors.title: Arbisoft Summer Internship
mentors.description: If you are a tech enthusiast and looking to spend some quality time this summer, then here is an opportunity for you.

mentors.title: Software Engineer
mentors.description: We are looking for programmers with fast learning curve, flexible attitude and a mind that is ready to accept challenges.

mentors.title: SocialBu Summer Internship
mentors.description: This opportunity brings you a chance to get a real life exposure to startup culture. Our dynamic startup environment and global clientele will help you get a greater learning experience.

mentors.title: PHP Developer
mentors.description:
Must be familiar with the basics of PHP
Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas
Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
Follow industry best practice
Develop and deploy new features to facilitate related procedures and tools if necessary

mentors.title: Java Developer
mentors.description:
FYP has to completed in Java development
Basic knowledge of designing and developing applications using Java EE platforms
Object Oriented analysis and design using common design patterns.
Profound insight of Java and JEE internals (Classloading, Memory Management, Transaction management etc)

mentors.title: Python Developer
mentors.description:
FYP has to completed in Python
Good problem-solving skills
Write effective, scalable code
Develop back-end components to improve responsiveness and overall performance
Integrate user-facing elements into applications
Test and debug programs
Improve functionality of existing systems
Coordinate with internal teams to understand user requirements and provide technical solutions

mentors.title: React Angular Developer
mentors.description:
Should have basic knowledge of SEO solutions
Creating custom, general use modules and components which extend the elements and modules of core AngularJS
Knowledge of building the infrastructure for serving the front-end app and assets
knowledge of JSDoc, creating the configuration, build, and test scripts for Continuous Integration environments.
